description:
Thank you to everyone who helped make PyOhio 2022 a success!

Talks are done, but you can stick around for:

-  `Chat on Discord`_
-  `T-Shirts`_ – through August 4
-  `Volunteering`_ for next year

.. _Chat on Discord: https://chat.pyohio.org
.. _T-Shirts: https://pyohio.org/shirts
.. _Volunteering: https://pyohio.org/volunteer
title: PyOhio 2022 Closing Remarks
